Text: nd Annual EnronMDA Beach BowlMr Skilling Enron and MDA are joining together again to do a nd Annual Beach Bowl to raise money for MDA Last year the event was a great success raising over This years goal is to raise so the fundraising benchmarks for all teams have been raised The money raised will be used to further research for ALS Lou Gehrigs Disease I have put together a team of Analyst interns for a second year to help in this cause The benchmark for the team is the raise prematching but I want to outdo the fundraising of postmatching we did last year I am asking for a donation to MDA to help our team bowl in this event Checks are payable to MDA FYI Enron matches all donations or more The event will take place on Saturday July Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Have a great day Tim Ng x

Thank youSkilling Good morning I just wanted to take the opportunity to say thank you for your generous donation The team of summer analysts appreciate your help I will keep you updated on our progress and after the Beach Bowl happens I will send over a picture of our team Thank you again Tim Ng Summer Analyst University of Florida x

Good luckMr Skilling As with the many employees here at Enron I wish you all the best ahead Im sorry to hear you leave but I know you have your reasons Im sure we all can respect that I just wanted to send you a note to say thanks again for the things youve done for me since last summer Theyre greatly appreciated Hopefully I will have the chance to meet with you again Wishing you the best and hopefully I will see you again Kindest regards Tim Ng Analyst x
